titles.title: To provide for the establishment of regional wildland fire research centers, and for other purposes.
To provide for the establishment of regional wildland fire research centers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committees on Agriculture, and Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
